function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The focus on perturbations with major social, political, economic, and/or ecological impacts may include contagious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Failure to consider the impacts of contagious diseases on conservation activities may lead to inadequate planning for disease outbreaks and their effects on biodiversity","Mitigation":"Include assessment and planning for the impacts of contagious diseases on conservation activities","Technologies":"Epidemiological models, disease surveillance technology","People":"Conservation planners, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, research institutions, and government agencies"}]}
